pullrequest.title: Specify type in GaussianNoiseModel to fix failing tests

content.raw:
I started trying to implement this change ( @iche033 took care of getting rid of GAUSSIAN_QUANTIZED ), and it's tricky.

I initially made this pull request because it was 3 lines to fix failing tests, and now it's requiring major refactoring of the Noise class. I'm giving up for now.
content.html:
I started trying to implement this change ( @iche033 took care of getting rid of GAUSSIAN_QUANTIZED ), and it's tricky.

I initially made this pull request because it was 3 lines to fix failing tests, and now it's requiring major refactoring of the Noise class. I'm giving up for now.
